entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 28 April 2016
